file.title: Dock

p.text: Stretches an object along a window border (left, bottom). This resizing remains (or the object is stretched even more) when the user changes window sizes.

p.textAll: All available docks are described in Quick fill words -> Docks.

sample.sampletitle: Variants of how button docks can be set:
sample.samplecode: Window1.Button1.Dock = "On left" Window1.Button1.Dock = Fill Window1.Button1.Dock = Window1.Button2.Dock Window1.Button1.Dock = Window1.Text1.Text
